snippet.title: Re:Turn 2 - Runaway - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Re:Turn 2 - Runaway, a 2d psychological horror adventure game. The game follows on from the events of the first game. Saki and her fiancé, Sen, are trapped on an abandoned train that is haunted by an evil spirit that takes the form of a little girl named Ayumi. 


Re:Turn 2 - Runaway launches on Steam and Consoles in Fall 2021

Wishlist Re:Turn 2 Now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/14...

Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/eYAaPBuNsA

https://redego.net/
